body:
Okay, review requests put in. One last time!

Also, we decided earlier today that, for preference experiment changes, we're going to merge regardless of Taskcluster results, and will depend on the try push before we sync the changes to mozilla-central until we fix the flakyness of our TC builds.

body_html:
Okay, review requests put in. One last time!

Also, we decided earlier today that, for preference experiment changes, we're going to merge regardless of Taskcluster results, and will depend on the try push before we sync the changes to mozilla-central until we fix the flakyness of our TC builds.
